trends: There have been 39 other sightings in Wichita
There were no other sightings in Wichita on or around May 4th 2012
Summary: Standing outside of house, and saw a brilliant light in south east sky.
divs: Sighting Detailsstanding out front of house, Im very experienced in stars and planets and this did not look like either. I felt a connection with the object. The object was high in the sky and over the 20 min that i watched it it dropped slowly below the houses in my neighborhood.
